name: Darth_Immern
content:
Darth Immern was a male Sith Lord of Human or Sith pureblood descent who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Great Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. In a fit of frustration, Immern executed the crew of his personal cruiser, an action that left him stranded in space; the Sith was forced to turn to the maintenance droid MZ-12 to help manage the cruiser's systems, and the astromech droid successfully guided the starship to an Imperial way station. Immern chose to spend a fortune to upgrade the droid's programming so that it could serve as his personal navigation droid, although Immern died in naval combat at the First Battle of Bothawui in 3671 BBY, leaving MZ-12 without a master.
Darth Immern was first mentioned in the Codex entry for MZ-12 in Galactic Starfighter, a Digital Expansion released in 2013 for the 2011 BioWare video game, Star Wars: The Old Republic.
